verbs.description: hpd [ARG1: narcotics officer] [V: charged] [ARG2: with dwi] [ARGM-TMP: after 4-car crash] an off - duty undercover houston police officer has been relieved of his duties after being charged with driving while intoxicated charge after authorities said he caused a four - car crash north of downtown houston police confirmed wednesday that officer bobby lee jennings 50 who joined the police department narcotics division in 1995 caused tuesday multi - vehicle accident in the 1200 block of houston avenue houston police chief art acevedo said that the officer had been placed on administrative leave pending an internal investigation into the incident officer bobby lee jennings houston lt larry crowson investigator chief art acevedo lt larry crowson harris county texas officer harris county texas hpd
